title: How to Block a Facebook Group on Android

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook. Look for the blue icon with a white “f” on your home screen. If you don’t see it, check the app drawer. Use this method if you want to stop seeing posts from a group in your news feed.

steps.title: Scroll to a post from the group.
steps.content: Scroll to a post from the group.

steps.title: Tap on the post.
steps.content: Tap on the post. It’s at the post’s top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Hide all from (group name).
steps.content: Tap Hide all from (group name) . You will no longer see posts from this group in your news feed.

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook. Look for the blue icon with a white “f” on your home screen. If you don’t see it, check the app drawer. Use this method to stop notifications of group activity on your Android.

steps.title: Tap the search icon.
steps.content: Tap the search icon. It’s the magnifying glass at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Start typing the name of the group.
steps.content: Start typing the name of the group. As you type, Facebook will display results that match your search.

steps.title: Tap the group you want to mute.
steps.content: Tap the group you want to mute. If you don’t see it, tap the search key on the keyboard to search all of Facebook for the group, then select it from the search results.

steps.title: Tap Info.
steps.content: Tap Info . It’s the icon with an “i” in a circle near the top of the screen. This opens the Group Info screen.

steps.title: Tap Off under “IN-APP.”
steps.content: Tap Off under “IN-APP.” A check mark will now appear next to “Off.” You will no longer be notified of activity or posts in the group.
